# SCNHitTestSearchMode.all

**Case**

The hit test should return all possible results, sorted from nearest to farthest.

## Declaration

```swift
case all
```

## Search Modes

- **SCNHitTestSearchMode.any**: The hit test should return only the first object found, regardless of distance.
- **SCNHitTestSearchMode.closest**: The hit test should return only the closes object found.
